item.title: Mobile Muster
item.description:
Current Twitter Bio


MobileMuster is the official product stewardship program of the mobile phone industry. It recycles for free all handsets, batteries, charges and accessories.




Minimum Minimum Rewrite: This rewrite 1) Fixes a typo, and 2) States the value proposition before the lengthy, official title, and 3) Rewords the “for free” sentence.


We recycle your handsets, batteries, and accessories. For free! Mobile Muster is the official product stewardship program of the mobile phone industry.




Minimum Rewrite: This rewrite 1) Fixes a typo, and 2) States the value proposition first; before the lengthy, official title. *The exclamation marks are optional and replaceable with fullstops.


We recycle your mobile phones for free! Your batteries and chargers too! MobileMuster is the official product stewardship program of the mobile phone industry.




Medium Rewritten: This Rewrite: 1) Fixes a typo. 2) States your value proposition first and foremost. 3) Replaces your long, official title with a *clickable call to action (clicks to Australia Post on Twitter). *The exclamation marks are optional and replaceable with fullstops.


We recycle your mobile phones for free! Your batteries and chargers too! Get a free reply paid satchel from @auspost today. #MobileMuster

item.title: About
item.description:
Hi I’m Lane — aka: CONCISELY. I’m a writer and conceptualist with a gift for delivering clear, creative language that’s easy to read, understand, and engage with. Short-form is my specialty — ads, blurbs, slogans, CTAs, value propositions, etc. — and more in less is my style.

Before I write anything I research everything — your brand, products/services, customers, and competitors — so when I write I write real: using logic, empathy, and art I can craft the most complicated concepts into beautiful, usable, actionable messages. And I don’t use adverbs lightly.

More in less is my life.
